title: Diabetes treatment may keep dementia, Alzheimer's at bay

title_detail.value: Diabetes treatment may keep dementia, Alzheimer's at bay

summary: A new study comparing people with diabetes, prediabetes and normal blood sugar finds that diabetes, left untreated, could mean a higher likelihood of developing dementia, including Alzheimer's disease.

summary_detail.value: A new study comparing people with diabetes, prediabetes and normal blood sugar finds that diabetes, left untreated, could mean a higher likelihood of developing dementia, including Alzheimer's disease.
